item.title: Collatz Conjecture + Unit Circle
item.description: I created my own Collatz Conjecture visualization, experimenting with a unit circle design that resulted in 360 distinct "branches". While it may not offer groundbreaking insights, the process was enjoyable and yielded interesting results, particularly for the number 327.
